name: Hybrid Tower Defense - Early Demo
description:
Collect Resources, Build Towers, Buy Items, Defend your Castle

This is an unfinished project! Development will continue for a while.

How to play:

  • Collect resources by walking up to them and holding 'F'
  • Build towers by opening the build menu with 'B'
  • Start a wave of enemies by going to your castle and holding 'F'
  • Go to one of the NPCs on the map to buy items and upgrades
  • Items are carried by the player when bought and need to be placed on a tower

The game contains a small tutorial but some things are not explained.
